what: Add setback column to tidyparcel object — add_setbacks
title: Add setback column to tidyparcel object — add_setbacks
text: `add_setbacks()` returns tidyparcel object new columns describing setback units side.

title: Add setback column to tidyparcel object — add_setbacks
code: add_setbacks(   tidyparcel,   tidydistrict,   tidybuilding,   tidyparcel_with_dims = NULL,   zoning_req = NULL )

title: Add setback column to tidyparcel object — add_setbacks
text: tidyparcel tidyparcel object simple features object depicting side parcel label (front, Interior side, Exterior side, rear, centroid). tidydistrict tidydistrict corresponding tidyparcel. tidydistrict object one row tidyzoning simple features object. tidybuilding tidybuilding list data frames used represent building.

title: Add setback column to tidyparcel object — add_setbacks
text: Returns tidyparcel object "setbacks" "units" column added end.

what: Compare building floor area ratio to zoning requirements — check_far
title: Compare building floor area ratio to zoning requirements — check_far
text: `check_far()` takes tidybuilding, tidydistrict, tidyparcel see district's zoning code allows tidybuilding based floor area ratio.

title: Compare building floor area ratio to zoning requirements — check_far
code: check_far(tidybuilding, tidydistrict = NULL, tidyparcel, zoning_req = NULL)

title: Compare building floor area ratio to zoning requirements — check_far
text: tidybuilding tidybuilding list data frames used represent building. tidydistrict tidydistrict corresponding tidyparcel. tidydistrict object one row tidyzoning simple features object. tidyparcel tidyparcel object simple features object depicting side parcel label (front, Interior side, Exterior side, rear, centroid). zoning_req data frame result `get_zoning_req()` function. provided, tidydistrict parccel need provided.

title: Compare building floor area ratio to zoning requirements — check_far
text: Returns TRUE FALSE stating whether building allowed district based floor area ratio.

title: Compare building floor area and allowed floor area — check_fl_area
text: tidybuilding tidybuilding list data frames used represent building. tidydistrict tidydistrict corresponding tidyparcel. tidydistrict object one row tidyzoning simple features object. tidyparcel tidyparcel object simple features object depicting side parcel label (front, Interior side, Exterior side, rear, centroid). zoning_req data frame result `get_zoning_req()` function. provided, tidydistrict parccel need provided.

title: Compare building floor area and allowed floor area — check_fl_area
text: Returns TRUE, FALSE, MAYBE stating whether building allowed district based floor area.

what: Create a parcel's buildable area — get_buildable_area
title: Create a parcel's buildable area — get_buildable_area
text: get_buildable_area() takes tidyparcel object setback information produces polygon representing builablel area parcel.

title: Create a parcel's buildable area — get_buildable_area
code: get_buildable_area(tidyparcel_with_setbacks)

title: Create a parcel's buildable area — get_buildable_area
text: tidyparcel_with_setbacks tidyparcel object setback infomration added. tidyparcel_with_setbacks output [add_setbacks()] function.

title: Create a parcel's buildable area — get_buildable_area
text: Returns polygon representing buildable area parcel.

title: Get district zoning requirements — get_zoning_req
text: many zoning requirements depend proposed building parcel zoning district, `get_zoning_req()` function takes tidybuilding, tidyparcel, tidydistrict outputs data frame listing set zoning requirements three objects create. every value NA, indicate building land use allowed zoning district.

title: Get district zoning requirements — get_zoning_req
code: get_zoning_req(tidybuilding, tidydistrict, tidyparcel)

title: Get district zoning requirements — get_zoning_req
text: tidybuilding tidybuilding list data frames used represent building. tidydistrict tidydistrict corresponding tidyparcel. tidydistrict object one row tidyzoning simple features object. tidyparcel tidyparcel object simple features object depicting side parcel label (front, Interior side, Exterior side, rear, centroid).

title: Get district zoning requirements — get_zoning_req
text: Returns data frame value zoning requirement specific building, parcel, zoning district. NA values indicate requirement recorded district. every value NA, indicate building land use allowed zoning district.

title: Add Zoning Requirements — ozfs_add_req
text: `ozfs_add_req()` takes existing geojson file ozfs format, adds simple constraint.

title: Add Zoning Requirements — ozfs_add_req
code: ozfs_add_req(   ozfs_file,   district,   constraint_type = "structure_constraints",   constraint,   units = NULL,   land_uses,   min_or_max,   expression,   overwrite = FALSE )

title: Add Zoning Requirements — ozfs_add_req
text: ozfs_file file path ozfs file needs editing district district needs editing constraint_type constraint type. "structure_constraints", "lot_constraints", "other_constraints" constraint constraint either editing adding. units units constraint. necessary adding new constraint. land_uses land use constraint applies . existing constraint, land_uses match existing land use possibilities. min_or_max Whether expression "min" "max" expression expression used describe new zoning constraint. overwrite TRUE, overwrite existing file.

title: Add Zoning Requirements — ozfs_add_req
text: statement saying file updates added .

title: Rotate polygon by specified angle — rotate_shape
text: shape polygon want rotate. Must special feature object one row. angle_degrees angle (degrees) want rotate shape center center rotate form XY coordinates. Default null,  NULL, rotation centroid.

text: Returns simple feature shape object rotated geometry

title: Run initial check functions — tz_all_checks
text: `tz_initial_checks()` runs initial tidyzoning check functions see certain attributes building allowed parcel.

title: Run initial check functions — tz_all_checks
code: tz_all_checks(   tidybuilding,   tidyzoning,   tidyparcel_dims,   tidyparcel_geo = NULL,   detailed_check = FALSE,   run_check_land_use = TRUE,   run_check_height = TRUE,   run_check_height_eave = TRUE,   run_check_floors = TRUE,   run_check_unit_size = TRUE,   run_check_far = TRUE,   run_check_unit_density = TRUE,   run_check_lot_coverage = TRUE,   run_check_fl_area = TRUE,   run_check_unit_qty = TRUE,   run_check_footprint = FALSE )

title: Run initial check functions — tz_all_checks
text: tidybuilding tidybuilding list data frames used represent building. tidyzoning tidyzoning simple features object representing zoning districts regulations area. tidyparcel_with_dimensions data frame tidyparcel information. zoning_id column tidyparcel_with_dimensions must correspond row numbers tidyzoning object. tidyparcel_with_side_geom data frame parcel side geometry func_names character list check functions want run. run_parallel Logical. `TRUE` code runs multiple cores (one less machine available). save time processing 50,000 parcels. Default `FALSE`

title: Run initial check functions — tz_all_checks
text: data frame initial check function results.

title: Run initial check functions — tz_initial_checks
text: `tz_initial_checks()` runs initial tidyzoning check functions see certain attributes building allowed parcel.

title: Run initial check functions — tz_initial_checks
code: tz_initial_checks(   tidybuilding,   tidyzoning,   tidyparcel_with_dimensions,   func_names = c("check_land_use", "check_height", "check_height_eave", "check_floors",     "check_unit_size", "check_far", "check_unit_density", "check_lot_coverage",     "check_fl_area", "check_unit_qty"),   run_parallel = FALSE,   detailed_check = FALSE )

title: Run initial check functions — tz_initial_checks
text: tidybuilding tidybuilding list data frames used represent building. tidyzoning tidyzoning simple features object representing zoning districts regulations area. tidyparcel_with_dimensions data frame tidyparcel information. zoning_id column tidyparcel_with_dimensions must correspond row numbers tidyzoning object. func_names character list check functions want run. run_parallel Logical. `TRUE` code runs multiple cores (one less machine available). save time processing 50,000 parcels. Default `FALSE` detailed_check Logical. `TRUE`, returns data frame stating whether building allowed parcel. Otherwise, return data frame every chack function's results. Default `FALSE`

title: Run initial check functions — tz_initial_checks
text: data frame initial check function results.
